title: Need Bronze Laner (Fallout Horizon)
body: Need Bronze to Low lvl silver ranked member to climb. We have decent constant 4 man group and desperate need to get outta these provisionals. pls halp{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey I thought i might have recognised you xD
Fear not im climbing to Silver in SoloQ and i'd be happy to help your ranked 5
I'd like to join mainly because i can improve mechanics and season rewards if your interested 
don't hesistate to PM me

I'm currently in B3, I main support and mid. I can play jungle and top also (not so great at adc but I can practice in norms and customs).
I'll be home in a few hours so if you can add me that'd be sweet.  ( ^ω^ ) ♥

Hey bro! I am currently in B2 and have only been playing for a bout a month. My acc is IMPxADES. Add me and send me a message and I'll join your team. I can play all roles relatively well, jungle main and top backup. The others I can play well anyway.
Hey, Im down, add me: PixelPie
